discourse_list.title: Multi-Collateral DAI is available on SWFT Blockchain

content.content: SWFT Blockchain Cross-chain wallet & payments app powered by SWFTC that enables users to own, send, receive, swap, & pay with 200+ cryptocurency directly, instantly, and securely.   twitter.com    Maker (MakerDAO)  #DAI was just listed on @SwftCoin, a cross-chain wallet app that enables users to manage and trade securely at 0.05% fees. Check it out: twitter.com/SwftCoin/statu… SWFT Blockchain @SwftCoin🔥New listing: $DAI from @MakerDAO🔥     The first decentralized stablecoin on the @ethereum blockchain is now available on SWFT Blockchain!    📲 Download #SWFTBlockchain now to directly swap DAI and 90+ other #cryptos in one app!  https://t.co/MLhLLzVPzL https://t.co/AsYkRnJ7Lm https://t.co/cXhK0qJWgr    2:56 AM - 21 Dec 2018     35          6            Now DAI is still on SWFT Blockchain and now you can do so much more with it!   Swap DAI with 200+ cryptocurrencies   Pay anyone, anytime, anywhere with DAI using SWFTPay   Share DAI with up to 5,000 people in Red Packets on any social media!   Register and Try now!   Dai Listed on SWFT Blockchain1280×720 91.3 KB
